bibl.title: The Range of Documentary Texts: Types and Categories.
bibl.note: Why Some Things Are Documented and Others Are Not: Written Documents and Illiterate People; - Lost Documentation. - Types of Documents: Private Documents (Private Communications; - Private Legal Documents; - Accounts; - Beliefs and Superstition); - Public Life (Political History; - Pronouncements of Government and Administration; - Minutes and Proceedings; - Official Correspondance; - The Administration of Justice; - Interaction between State and Individual [Petitions to Authorities; Routine Declarations to Authorities; Services for the State]; - Military; - Changes).
PALME Bernhard, The Range of Documentary Texts: Types and Categories.
R.S. BAGNALL (Ed.), The Oxford Handbook of Papyrology (Oxford, 2009) pp. 358-394.
